product_name: Native Eyewear Lodo Polarized Sunglasses - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed for fashion and function, these polarized lenses cut glare for better visibility and contrast in bright sunlight, keeping you comfortable and stylish on mountain trails or downtown outings.
